name: markdown-it-preview
description: Markdown Preview that supports MarkdownIt plugins on a per-project basis.

liveUpdate.description: Re-render the preview as the contents of the source changes, without requiring the source buffer to be saved. If disabled, the preview is re-rendered only when the buffer is saved to disk.

openPreviewInSplitPane.description: Open the preview in a split pane. If disabled, the preview is opened in a new tab in the same pane.

allowUnsafeProtocols.description: Allow HTML attributes to use protocols normally considered unsafe such as `file://` and absolute paths on Windows.

grammars.description: List of scopes for languages for which previewing is enabled. See [this README](https://github.com/atom/spell-check#spell-check-package-) for more information on finding the correct scope for a specific language.

useGitHubStyle.title: Use GitHub.com style
useGitHubStyle.description: Use the same CSS styles for preview as the ones used on GitHub.com.

xhtmlOut.title: Generate valid XHTML output
xhtmlOut.description: Explicitly close all self-closing HTML tags.

breaks.title: Convert newlines to BR tags
breaks.description: Convert newlines in paragraphs into BR tags.

langPrefix.title: Language prefix
langPrefix.description: CSS language prefix for fenced blocks. Can be useful for external highlighters.

linkify.title: Create links from URLs
linkify.description: Create A tags from URL-like text.

typographer.title: Enable typographer
typographer.description: Enable some language-neutral replacement and quotes beautification.

quotes.title: Quotation characters
quotes.description: Double and single quotes replacement pairs, when typographer enabled, and smartquotes on.
